p: African green monkey kidney epithelial cells (Vero; CCL-81; ATCC) were cultured in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) (Invitrogen, Darmstadt, Germany) containing 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Life Technology, Australia), 100 U/mL penicillin, and 100 μg/mL streptomycin maintained in 5% CO 2 at 37 °C. The parental ZIKV was rescued by transfecting Vero cells with the full-length cDNA clone, ZIKV-FL, as previously described 10.
